alert.note: Alert for Sanborn (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 09 at 9:34AM MDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Dakota... James River at Huron affecting Beadle County. James River near Forestburg affecting Sanborn County. For the James River...including Huron, Forestburg, Mitchell...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...James River near Forestburg. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, flooding begins over the left bank and a few county or township roads begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:01 AM CDT Monday the stage was 9.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Wednesday afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 12.7 feet early Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 PM CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu James River Forestburg 12.0 9.9 Mon 10 AM CDT 10.2 11.7 12.7 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Tuesday afternoon at 1230 PM CDT.
